description: Randy Kates Thanksgiving will soon be upon us.   I'm thankful for so many things.  For being born in the USA.  For growing up in the era where we were able to play outside and use our imaginations.   For living in a neighborhood, Jodie Road, full of great kids.   For my childhood friends including, but not limited to,  Eric Robinson ,  Judy Jo Hoar Drake ,   Arnie Pollinger ,  Sheryl Greenspan ,  Kenny Gross ,  Jeff Fuhrman , Jeff Austin, Michael Desimone,  William Harmon ,  Jimmy Muto ,  Joe Keefe ,  Bobby Bell  and many others. For my awesome cousins who are some of my closest friends today including  Barry Kates ,  Joe B ,  Michele Kay Kates , and anyone else with the last named Kates, Berkowitz, Gilbert, Jelen, and yes now you too  Shari Lynne Teague .   For my adult friendships including so many of you that I don't have enough time but special thanks to  Sandy Kitchner ,  Greg Eslinger , and Scott Seldin,  Marc Futterweit  who have always had my back and you too  Ellen Levine ,  Doreen DeRose ,  Lynn Hoebing  and  Patti Hoebing ,  Linda McCurry Ruh  and her man Paul.  For the great family I have including my amazing dad and Mom, my brother  Jeff Kates , Sister  Lisa Kates Epstein , great sister-in-law  Edye Weiss Kates  and her mother  Elaine Kaplan Weiss Hirsch , and my nieces and nephews.  For my two great kids Josh Kates, and  Jelen Kates  and to my ex-wife for bringing them into my world.  For my beautiful and loving fiancé  Christine Walker   and for coming into my life and knocking my socks off and bringing Aiden with you. For Michael Adamson for mentoring me in my 20's and making it possible to own Kates Technology today.  For my amazing uncle Richard Jelen who role modeled for me how to be the uncle and man I man today.  For all my reconnections on Facebook.  For so many things I could go on for hours.  I know I forgot many of you and just because I failed to mention you does not mean that I do not consider you a friend and grateful that you are in my life.  Thanks for listening. Randy Randy

description: Edye Weiss Kates  is with  Elaine Kaplan Weiss Hirsch . Congrats to the Cubbies and all my family here and back home in Chicago but this shout out is especially for my mom who undoubtedly is the most loyal Cub fan I know.  As a little girl, she would take the train by herself to the games and didn't care whether they would win or lose.  She is a member of their official fan club and all she ever wanted was to see them win a world series.  As she approaches her 80th birthday, her wish comes true and can finally check it off her bucket list!!!

description: Kelly Griffin Porter  is with  Edye Weiss Kates  and  37 others . Let's create something fun and positive over the next few weeks leading up to the holidays! Anyone interested in a holiday gift exchange? It doesn't matter where you live, you are welcome to join. I need 6 (or more) ladies of any age to participate in a secret sister gift exchange.  You only have to buy ONE gift valued at $10 or more and send it to ONE secret sister. Afterwards, you will receive 6-36 gifts in return!! It all depends how many ladies join. Amazon or another on-line shop makes it easy.  Let me know if you are interested and I will send you the information!  ❤  Please don't ask to participate if you're not going to follow through with sending one $10 gift.  TIS THE SEASON! Comment below if you're in & I'll send you the details via FB messenger - if they are confusing at all, please let me know!!  If I didn't tag you, it doesn't mean you can't participate. This will be super fun!!!  XOXO. Kelly Kelly Hennessy Kelly Griffin Porter

description: Jennifer Simons Jewell  added  27 new photos  — with  Edye Weiss Kates  and  18 others  at  Isabella's Kitchen . What an amazing night, last night!  Turning 50 is a blast!!!  But remember, I still have 4 days to go before the big day, and I'm going to enjoy being 49 as long as I can 😂 😂 😂   Marna Reynolds  and  Laurie Segal Nadershahi , I cannot thank you enough, for throwing me the most beautiful and spectacular party!  You both really went over the top and out of your way to make this night absolutely perfect and unforgettable for me!    Thank you to all my beautiful girlfriends and family members who celebrated with me last night!  Words cannot express just how much it meant to me to have you all there.  I feel so blessed to have each and every one of you in my life!!! description: Jennifer Simons Jewell  added  27 new photos  — with  Edye Weiss Kates  and  18 others  at  Isabella's Kitchen . What an amazing night, last night!  Turning 50 is a blast!!!  But remember, I still have 4 days to go before the big day, and I'm going to enjoy being 49 as long as I can 😂 😂 😂   Marna Reynolds  and  Laurie Segal Nadershahi , I cannot thank you enough, for throwing me the most beautiful and spectacular party!  You both really went over the top and out of your way to make this night absolutely perfect and unforgettable for me!    Thank you to all my beautiful girlfriends and family members who celebrated with me last night!  Words cannot express just how much it meant to me to have you all there.  I feel so blessed to have each and every one of you in my life!!!  Looking forward to the next 50 years and making more incredible memories with these fabulous women!   ❌ ⭕️ ❤️ ❌ ⭕️ ❤️ ❌ ⭕️ ❤️ ❌ ⭕️ ❤️
